Subscription.Description: Records creation, modification and access of file shares
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <!-- Network share access --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5140)]]</Select> <!--Suppress common network noise --> <Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\IPC$']] or <!-- IPC$ share access occurs frequently on a typical network --> *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\SYSVOL']] <!-- Domain/Group policy share that often gets accessed --> </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- Network share creation--> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5142)]]</Select> <!--Suppress common network noise --> <Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\IPC$']] or (*[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\C$']] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareLocalPath']= '\??\C:\']]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\D$']] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareLocalPath']= '\??\D:\']]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\E$']] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareLocalPath']= '\??\E:\']]) or *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\ADMIN$']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='ShareName']='\\*\print$']] </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- Network share modification and deletion --> <Query Id="2" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5143 or EventID=5144)]]</Select> </Query>
</QueryList>
